meaningMnemonic: Remember 頑張る means “to persevere” or “to do one’s best”? This time you're telling someone to 頑張る, so this word means something like <vocabulary>do your best</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>hang in there</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>good luck</vocabulary>! Speaking of which, 頑張れ, you!
readingMnemonic: The reading comes from 頑張る.
